recipeCategory.@value: Cakes & Desserts, Camp Oven, One-Pot Dish

recipeInstructions.@value: Bring a large pot of water to the boil and place bag in pot and use lid to hold it down as it will float slightly
Serve with either cream or ice cream Yum!
Mix chocolate cake as per directions
Remove air from bag and tie off with twisty
Break up caramello into squares and mix through cake mix
The caramello will melt slightly letting the sauce ooze through the pudding and leave small chunks of chocolate as well.
Add mix to oven bag, this is easier if you use a desert bowl as a mould for the bottom of the bag.
Slow boil for around one and a half hours cake will set like a pudding
